page.title: 15LADYMOUNT SCHOOL
page.content: Ladymount school is built like a honeycomb because it is hexagonal in shape. All the classrooms are hexagonal and there are lots of little corners. We have three infant classes and four Junior classes and we now have a pre-school group which only takes place on three mornings per week. Our classrooms have rectangular and hexagonal tables, and we sit in groups of four or six. We keep all our books and pencils in a tray which we store in a special unit with ledges to fit the trays. We decorate the walls with colourful collages. We did one of the beach and one of Springtime. We have charts about the weather and various charts to do with maths.
